## Text.escapeRegExp() method

Escapes a string so that it can be treated as a literal string when used in a regular expression.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static escapeRegExp(literal: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  literal | string |  |

**Returns:**

string
